title: Trouble getting the SKWidget to appear in the GUI Designer in MonoDevelop (on Linux)
body:
I added the packages `SkiaSharp` and `SkiaSharp.Views` to my project.  In the GUI designer, I didn't see the `SKWidget` appear in the `Toolbox`.  I have other projects in my solution that have custom widgets and they appear in there.

I tried adding the `SkaiSharp.Views.Gtk` DLL (from the solution's `packages/` folder) using that little "green plus button" and got a `SKWidget` to appear under the `General` section in the toolbox.  But when trying to drag the widget into my GUI, I got an error message saying "The widget 'SkiaSharp.Views.Gtk.SKWidget' could not be found."

What wrong and how can I fix this?  I'd really like to use Skia for my custom widget drawing.
